name: The Veil
description:
The Veil is a 3D horror game with 2D platformer elements. It was created during Ludum Dare 41 by Draquise (writing) and Nehvis (programming, worldbuilding).

Theme: "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres"

Play with headphones for the best experience!

Controls:

  • WASD - Walk
  • F - Interact
  • Return - Confirm
  • Space - Jump (Platformer only)

Can you get both endings?

SAFETY NOTE 1: Unfortunately, there are some audio bugs. In order to save your ears, turn down your system volume!

SAFETY NOTE 2: If you have problems with epilepsy, you probably shouldn't play this!
